Title: Directs public bodies that have meetings that allow public comments to provide a means for the public to comment in real time
Summary: Directs public bodies that have meetings that allow public comments to provide a means for the public to comment in real time during the time allocated for public comment.
LawCode: Amd ยง103, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to directing public bodies that have meetings that allow public comments to provide a means for the public to comment in real time
